abstract  void mergeConfigs(FilterConfigs configs)
          Merges the incoming configurations object with "this", typically the incoming configurations object will have some null fields (due to lack of info on the caller side), those null fileds should be filtered out, and only valid fields are copied to "this" object.

Constructor Detail

FilterConfigs

public FilterConfigs(java.lang.String name,
                     CommonFilterConfigs common_configs)
Initializes configurations.

Parameters:
name - name of the filter these configurations are intended for.

Method Detail

getConfigurablename

public java.lang.String getConfigurablename()
Gets the filter name for this configuration object.

Returns:
String containing the filter's name

mergeConfigs

public abstract void mergeConfigs(FilterConfigs configs)
Merges the incoming configurations object with "this", typically the incoming configurations object will have some null fields (due to lack of info on the caller side), those null fileds should be filtered out, and only valid fields are copied to "this" object.

Parameters:
configs - incoming configurations object

validate

public abstract boolean validate()
Checks that All configurations are set. (for testing purposes only)

Returns:
true: success
